Category:Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Allen Hamilton was a voice actor in the audio drama version of Crimson Empire. He also voiced Jerec in Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama, Dark Forces: Rebel Agent audio drama and Dark Forces: Jedi Knight audio drama.
